contentList.content: An old suit of... armor? It looks like a crab carapace. It's definitely been lost for a while, as vines have made their winding way through its crevices.
An old suit of... armor? It looks like a crab carapace. It's definitely been lost for a while, as vines have made their winding way through its crevices.
An old suit of... armor? It looks like a crab carapace. The vines are thriving with how much blood you've spilled.

An old suit of... armor? It looks like a crab carapace. Enthralled with the vitality of your prey, your attacks now ignore <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Necrotic damage. Your v(e)iny carapace also reduces all incoming damage by [1].

An old suit of... armor? It looks like a crab carapace. Enthralled with the vitality of your prey, your attacks now ignore <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to Necrotic damage. Your v(e)iny carapace also reduces all incoming damage by [1].

An old suit of... armor? It looks like a crab carapace. Enthralled with the vitality of your prey, your attacks now ignore <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to Necrotic damage. Your v(e)iny carapace also reduces all incoming damage by [1].
